alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 25 at 4:38PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall may still be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The threat of widespread heavy rain has diminished, but local flash flooding may still occur in isolated heavy showers that may drop 2 inches or more in an hour. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
